title: Is the world up to the challenge of mass COVID-19 vaccination?
description: The magnitude of the task will test global supply chains like never before and needs bold collective action from multinationals, governments and industries
cleaned_text: up to the challenge of mass COVID-19 vaccination? The COVID-19 vaccine's inclusive, safe and sustainable distribution to health workers, at-risk groups and eventually everyone will test global supply chains.
